name: Apple 🍎
description: A sweet and crisp fruit that is usually red or green.

name: Banana 🍌
description: A soft, sweet fruit that is high in potassium.

name: Orange 🍊
description: A juicy citrus fruit that is high in vitamin C.

name: Grapes 🍇
description: Small, sweet, and juicy fruits that grow in bunches.

name: Strawberry 🍓
description: A bright red, juicy fruit that is sweet and slightly tart.

name: Pineapple 🍍
description: A tropical fruit with a sweet and tangy flavor.

name: Mango 🥭
description: A sweet and juicy tropical fruit with a unique flavor.

name: Watermelon 🍉
description: A refreshing fruit with a high water content, perfect for summer.

name: Blueberry 🫐
description: Small, round berries that are sweet and packed with antioxidants.

name: Peach 🍑
description: A juicy fruit with a fuzzy skin and sweet flavor.

name: Cherry 🍒
description: A small, round fruit that is usually red or black and sweet or tart.

name: Kiwi 🥝
description: A small, brown fruit with bright green flesh that is tangy and sweet.

name: Pear 🍐
description: A sweet fruit with a soft texture and a bell-like shape.

name: Plum 🍑
description: A juicy fruit that can be sweet or tart, often purple or red.

name: Coconut 🥥
description: A hard-shelled fruit with sweet water and creamy flesh.

name: Raspberry 🍇
description: A small, red fruit that is sweet and tart, high in fiber.

name: Blackberry 🖤
description: A dark purple fruit that is sweet and slightly tart.

name: Papaya 🧡
description: A tropical fruit that is sweet and orange inside, rich in enzymes.

name: Pomegranate ❤️
description: A round fruit filled with juicy seeds that are sweet and tart.

name: Lemon 🍋
description: A sour citrus fruit that is yellow and high in vitamin C.
